channel.title: Need help with unmute pleasee
channel.description: okay i got an unmute command from richscape v4 and i got it to unmute but if i log out and back in im still muted. like ill unmute my self and i can talk to someone and they will see it but if i log out and back in im muted again how do i fix?

item.title: Need help with unmute pleasee
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

Most likely you’re only changing a temporary variable, all the variables are ‘reset’ when you log in so if it’s not saved in your character file it won’t be permanent.

Read full topic
